title: Algeria strongly condemns terrorist attack in Burkina Faso
text: Algeria strongly condemns the terrorist attack perpetrated against the residents of the village of Solhan, in the north of Burkina Faso, killing more than a hundred people among civilians, including women and children.

Algeria expresses its full solidarity with the government and the people of Burkina Faso, reiterating its unwavering commitment to support international and regional efforts to eliminate the scourge of terrorism, whose spread within the Sahel region seriously threatens the stability, security and development of the region's countries.
